page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: The houses in the area are in the main the large farmhouse type still kept in their original form where ever possible. The Elizabethan farmhouse "Pwll Halog" being a perfect example, (See Slide B). Space in the home is something now enjoyed as families are much smaller than many years ago. Smaller cottages are sold as soon as they appear on the market with great prospects for improvements being seen by their purchasers. The local Planning Authority is very strict and no unsightly buildings or alterations have been allowed to spoil the area.
